name: Transformity
headline: Point-of-sale & Vertical SaaS for the $75B Liquor Industry
description: Transformity is empowering beer, wine & liquor stores with amazing technology. We bring enterprise-level sophistication to liquor retailers, giving them one integrated operating system for every part of their business. Our product integrates with distributors, automates manual work, and opens new sources of revenue.

founders.name: Param Bidja, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO @ Transformity. Previously senior engineer at AWS. Love my parents so much that I'm building a company for them :)

founders.name: Jay Patel, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CTO @ Transformity. Ex-Software Engineer at Amazon. Owner of multiple retail businesses. Active GitHub Contributor.

# The modern liquor store point-of-sale system.
Transformity is a point-of-sale system for liquor stores that grows their business and saves them time.
  * [Show me more!](https://transformity.tech/<https:/calendly.com/param-bidja/transformity-introduction>)


## Why Transformity?
  * ![](https://cdn.unicornplatform.com/static/img/twemoji/1f3f7.svg)
### Customer personalization
Transformity offers your customers unique deals they can't get anywhere else, making for a loyal following that's hard to compete with. You'll be able to send marketing campaigns based on customer purchase history. 
  * ![](https://cdn.unicornplatform.com/static/img/twemoji/1f4c3.svg)
### Auto-receive invoices
Transformity has 3 different channels to receive invoices from vendors. Your inventory stays accurate without needing to punch in invoices.


  * ![](https://cdn.unicornplatform.com/static/img/twemoji/231a.svg)
### Operations-centric
We grew up in liquor stores, so we made Transformity operations centric. From counting inventory to printing labels to reporting your sales tax - everything is easier than any other POS you've seen.
  * ![](https://cdn.unicornplatform.com/static/img/twemoji/1f4e5.svg)
### Integrated with distributors
Transformity integrates with distributors so you can see available discounts, pricing, the entire catalog, receive digital invoices, and generate purchase orders based on pricing & sales. 
  * ![](https://cdn.unicornplatform.com/static/img/twemoji/1f6f0.svg)
### Remotely operate your store
Transformity is fully cloud-based, and enables you to monitor key updates about your store's performance. No more servers in the back room :)
  * ![](https://cdn.unicornplatform.com/static/img/twemoji/1f528.svg)
### Amazing support, for real
We don't simply say our support is amazing, we guarantee response time and we'll install in-person.
  * ![](https://cdn.unicornplatform.com/static/img/twemoji/1f4b3.svg)
### Multiple credit card processors
We know how important credit card processing is to your decision, so we've integrated with multiple processors to help.
  * ![](https://cdn.unicornplatform.com/static/img/twemoji/1f6cd.svg)
### Truely multi-store
If you own multiple liquor stores, you'll leverage a single shared database between your stores for side-by-side reporting & inventory transfers.


## What Our Users Say
  * ![643346a74c449c27f06ca44b](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/18b880c4-e568-4809-8997-fcc91e37abdd?optimizer=gif)
"Its simplicity is refreshing, making it incredibly user-friendly for both staff and customers. Transactions are lightning-fast, reducing wait times and improving overall efficiency. The integration with vendor pricing is seamless, ensuring accurate and up-to-date pricing information at all times.
Moreover, the system's reliability and stability have been impressive. We haven't encountered any downtime or performance issues, which is crucial for maintaining smooth operations, especially during peak hours."
Meet Ashar, Manager of RK Wine & Spirits
  * ![](https://store-logos-public-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/Contislogo.jpeg)
"I have no doubt in my mind that this system is the key to success.**"**
Nick Conti, top 100 liquor retailer in the US
[ Conti's Wines & Spirits ](https://transformity.tech/<https:/www.instagram.com/contiswines/>)
  * ![657ba766d03f742b9bdd96db](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/1f09c391-46b2-46f4-99f2-4255dc452db6?optimizer=gif)
"I am big on technology, online presence, and data-driven marketing. I have found one of the best tools to serve my customers based on their interests and past purchases, which I can track through the Transformity customer loyalty program. Most importantly, this is an all-in-one system where I can run my multiple stores from one central system. Having a shared database for my stores is extremely powerful for side-by-side analysis and operations.**"**
Vikhil Patel, Owner of Townline Wine & Spirits chain
  * ![Bottle house](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/3458db40-65c8-47ef-bdae-d8de794fb5c4?optimizer=gif)
"Running a large warehouse store is tough, but it's a whole lot easier with Transformity's DrinksPOS. Invoices come into our system automatically, purchase orders are fast & very accurate, I can very clearly analyze our business, and the support is amazing - they respond right away!" 
Jay Joshi, Owner & Manager of Bottle House

Moreover, the system's reliability and stability have been impressive. We haven't encountered any downtime or performance issues, which is crucial for maintaining smooth operations, especially during peak hours."
Meet Ashar, Manager of RK Wine & Spirits
  * ![](https://store-logos-public-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/Contislogo.jpeg)
"I have no doubt in my mind that this system is the key to success.**"**
Nick Conti, top 100 liquor retailer in the US
[ Conti's Wines & Spirits ](https://transformity.tech/<https:/www.instagram.com/contiswines/>)
  * ![657ba766d03f742b9bdd96db](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/1f09c391-46b2-46f4-99f2-4255dc452db6?optimizer=gif)
"I am big on technology, online presence, and data-driven marketing. I have found one of the best tools to serve my customers based on their interests and past purchases, which I can track through the Transformity customer loyalty program. Most importantly, this is an all-in-one system where I can run my multiple stores from one central system. Having a shared database for my stores is extremely powerful for side-by-side analysis and operations.**"**
Vikhil Patel, Owner of Townline Wine & Spirits chain
  * ![Bottle house](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/3458db40-65c8-47ef-bdae-d8de794fb5c4?optimizer=gif)
"Running a large warehouse store is tough, but it's a whole lot easier with Transformity's DrinksPOS. Invoices come into our system automatically, purchase orders are fast & very accurate, I can very clearly analyze our business, and the support is amazing - they respond right away!"

## Our team
  * ![Bidja param 674 pilotsf 0002](https://unicorn-images.b-cdn.net/9fd095e8-3817-4979-81f4-508af082d4dc?optimizer=gif)
Param Bidja
Founder & CEO 
Param's parents have owned a liquor store in Connecticut for 20 years. He was previously a senior engineer at Amazon and graduated top of his class from UConn.
    * [![linkedin icon](https://cdn.unicornplatform.com/static/img/icons/social/black/linkedin.svg)](https://transformity.tech/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/parambidja/>)

Jay Patel
Founder & CTO 
Jay's parents have owned liquor stores in New York and Rhode Island since he was born. He was previously a software engineer at Amazon and a top contributor on GitHub.
    * [![linkedin icon](https://cdn.unicornplatform.com/static/img/icons/social/black/linkedin.svg)](https://transformity.tech/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/patel-jay/>)
    * ![email icon](https://cdn.unicornplatform.com/static/img/icons/social/black/email.svg)

Raj Patel
Founding Engineer 
Raj has a wealth of technical expertise from his own startups and time at Chewy. Not only is he strong full-stack developer, he's also a talented designer. When he's not working, you'll find him dunking on folks at a local gym.
    * [![linkedin icon](https://cdn.unicornplatform.com/static/img/icons/social/black/linkedin.svg)](https://transformity.tech/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/rpatel3318/>)

generated_description:
### Transformity: Revolutionizing the Liquor Store Experience

**Overview:**  
Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Transformity is on a mission to modernize the $75 billion liquor industry with a comprehensive point-of-sale (POS) and vertical software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform tailored for liquor retailers. Based in an undisclosed location, the young company boasts a lean team of three, including founder and CEO Param Bidja.

**What They Do:**  
Transformity is all about making liquor retail operations smoother and more profitable. They provide a single integrated operating system that connects beer, wine, and liquor stores with their distributors, streamlining invoice processing, inventory management, and sales reporting. It's built by people who understand the industry—both Param and co-founder Jay Patel grew up in liquor retail environments. Their tech aims to reduce manual tasks, enhance efficiency, and ultimately unlock new revenue streams for their users.

**Key Features:**
- **Personalized Customer Experience:** Transformity helps retailers craft unique deals based on individual purchase histories, fostering customer loyalty.
- **Automated Invoice Handling:** The platform automates the reception of invoices, ensuring inventory accuracy without manual data entry.
- **Operations-Centric Design:** Every part of the system is designed to ease daily operations, from inventory counts to sales tax reporting.
- **Integrated Distributor Pricing:** Users can seamlessly access discounts, pricing, and catalogs from distributors.
- **Cloud-Based Access:** Retailers can manage their stores remotely without cumbersome in-house servers.
- **Responsive Customer Support:** Transformity promises quick response times and on-site installation assistance.
- **Multi-Store Management:** Owners with multiple locations can share databases, facilitating efficient side-by-side reporting and operations.

**Testimonials:**
Users rave about the platform's user-friendliness and speed, with many noting that it significantly enhances their operational efficiency. For instance, Ashar from RK Wine & Spirits claims it’s user-friendly and reliable, while Nick Conti, a top retailer, asserts that Transformity is essential for success in liquor retail.

**The Team Behind Transformity:**  
- **Param Bidja** (Founder & CEO): A former senior engineer at Amazon, Param’s background in technology and family ties to liquor retail create a compelling blend of insights.
- **Jay Patel** (Founder & CTO): Also an ex-Amazon engineer, Jay brings a wealth of technical knowledge, underscored by his strong connection to the liquor industry through his family.
- **Raj Patel** (Founding Engineer): With experience from Chewy and other startups, Raj complements the team with his full-stack development and design skills.

**Connect:**
